body_html:
I have met the same problem when I load openpose quantized model to Android.
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException: Internal error: Cannot allocate memory for the interpreter: tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/pooling.cc:104 input->params.scale != output->params.scale (3 != 3)
at org.tensorflow.lite.NativeInterpreterWrapper.createInterpreter(Native Method)
at org.tensorflow.lite.NativeInterpreterWrapper.(NativeInterpreterWrapper.java:73)
at org.tensorflow.lite.NativeInterpreterWrapper.(NativeInterpreterWrapper.java:52)
at org.tensorflow.lite.Interpreter.(Interpreter.java:114)
How can I solve it?
Thanks.

body:
I have met the same problem when I load openpose quantized model to Android.
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException: Internal error: Cannot allocate memory for the interpreter: tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/pooling.cc:104 input->params.scale != output->params.scale (3 != 3)
        at org.tensorflow.lite.NativeInterpreterWrapper.createInterpreter(Native Method)
        at org.tensorflow.lite.NativeInterpreterWrapper.<init>(NativeInterpreterWrapper.java:73)
        at org.tensorflow.lite.NativeInterpreterWrapper.<init>(NativeInterpreterWrapper.java:52)
        at org.tensorflow.lite.Interpreter.<init>(Interpreter.java:114)
How can I solve it?
Thanks.
